metadata.title: CVE-2024-24680 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Django 3.2 before 3.2.24, 4.2 before 4.2.10, andDjango 5.0 before 5.0.2. The intcomma template filter was subject to apotential denial-of-service attack when used with very long strings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.10').
